data.title: Great fun for both kids and adults!!
data.text: Took my younger cousins visiting from California to the painting studio and they had so much fun that they want to come back again and again! Teachers were extremely helpful and nice... If you don't think you can paint, you're wrong! Everyone has a creative side and Sip N Doodle helped bring that out... Will definitely come back to paint again!

data.title: broken AC! Great artists
data.text: A few issues; I had sent an email to ask their physical address and didnt hear back. I called the number and the person who picked up the phone goes "first of all, I never got ur email". That may well be true. I might have sent the email to a wrong address but that us not how u respond to a customer. Also their AC was not working when we were there! They should have canceled the session. Texas in summer without AC is not fun. Their artists were young but great!

data.title: Great Energy
data.text: The teachers there were more than welcoming and were always smiling and seem to love what they do! They had the most up beat energy and you couldn't help but have a good time!

data.title: Good Girls night Out
data.text: We liked being able to paint the picture of our choice. Two of us would have liked a little more instruction, but the other three liked being able to do as they wished.  We had a great time, regardless and left happy.

data.title: Time with friends
data.text: I booked this place for a girls weekend. We chose Sip-N-Doodle over another place because we were able to choose our own picture to paint.  The host was awesome and very helpful!  We had a great time and would definitely go back!

data.title: Great time
data.text: Sip and doodle was awesome.  I enjoyed every minute of the 2 hours there.  I recommend this entertainment to everyone

data.title: Tween Birthday Party
data.text: Great venue for a "tween" girl birthday party!  Staff was extremely knowledgeable and encouraging to help each if the girls find their inner artist. Would highly recommend to all age/experience levels.

data.title: Sooooooooo fun!!
data.text: Loved the experience!! It was a total blast!! You get to choose your own painting and then the sweet girl that worked there would come around and show you what to start with and help with colors and brushes. Can't wait to do it again!!

data.title: Very helpful and pleasant artists
data.text: Enjoyed this experience. The 2 young ladies leading the class were great - very helpful. Plan to return!

data.title: Awesome gift from our kids!
data.text:
First time going, it was great fun!
We will certainly be returning and 
remembering our snacks and spirits !

data.title: Girls night out!
data.text: I loved that we could choose our own design.  Any help we needed, was quickly attended to.  Lots of fun!

data.title: Not the best
data.text: My wife and I have been to several of these painting places and this is the one we have liked the least.   You get to choose your own painting  to paint which we were excited about.  We got less that 5 mins instruction on brush strokes and that was it.  The instructor spent the rest of the time painting the paintings for the three other people.  I could have done this at home for a lot less money.  At the other places we have gone we have always been taught painting techniques.  Here you are just on your own for the most part. Quality of the supplies was poor.  The brushes were stiff and crusted with paint. Spend the money and got to Painting with a twist.

data.title: Too Much Fun
data.text: At first, the thought of going to a painting place where everyone picks their own painting scared me. Well that didn't last long - I LOVE getting a choice to paint and my girls did awesome.  SipnDoodle is a fun, down to earth place in downtown Frisco.  We will be back!

data.title: Girl's night out!
data.text: It was a fun night. The only downside is you only have two workers with 20 ladies so it takes a good whIle of time to sit until they can come help you at all.

data.title: Fun time with the girls
data.text: Host was amazing, sweet and kind. Very informative session, lovely time painting. Will definitely go again!

data.title: Loved it!
data.text: Great place and a fun time!!  Teacher was hilarious and always have a good time painting. I love that you can pick your own picture!

data.title: Date night and our daughter's birthday party
data.text: The hosts were great entertainers as well as teachers.  Great for a date night, which is what my husband and I did.  Also great for our daughter's 11th birthday party.  The hosts were very patient, attentive and helpful with each and every child.

data.title: Great date night
data.text: The instructors were very engaging and helpful when you needed the help! I loved that I could paint what I wanted to paint versus paint what was chosen for me

data.title: Lots of fun
data.text: We had a group of adults with cognitive impairment and their caregivers who had a wonderful time painting.  Allison & Ariel were very cool & worked with us to meet our time needs.  We are planning another trip to Sip-n-Doodle because it was fun and rewarding!!!

data.title: Best painting EVER
data.text: I loved going to SipNDoodle over a lot of other paint studios. The staff was very friendly and energetic and extremely helpful! One thing that separates this place from their competitors is their great customer service and the fact that you get to pick your own painting, you can even choose one off your phone! The class was super fun and they made painting a breeze. Already recommended this place to friends and family and hope to go again soon!
